compliant.section: This Privacy Statement explains how your personal information will be collected, processed and used, as well as how such information will be protected by Apacer Technology Inc . and its affiliates (collectively, “Apacer”) in accordance with the EU “General Data Protection Regulation”, the local country/ area’s personal information protection regulations, Apacer Privacy Statement (“Statement”) and other applicable laws .
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: Please read this Statement very carefully .
compliant.legal provisions: Information in relation to the processing of personal data should be concise, easily accessible and easy to understand

compliant.section: By starting to use Apacer websites or services, or providing your personal information in any way, Apacer will regard it as you understand and agree to this Statement .

Apacer will not process or use your personal information outside the scope of this Statement, unless it is required by law, the competent authority or judicial department, or as required for legal claims, defenses or deemed necessary in preventing fraudulences or other illegal actions .
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data -  purpose limitation

compliant.section: We will also not sell, exchange or lease out your personal information .
compliant.legal provisions: Processing of special categories of personal data

non_compliant.section: This Privacy Statement explains how your personal information will be collected, processed and used, as well as how such information will be protected by Apacer Technology Inc . and its affiliates (collectively, “Apacer”) in accordance with the EU “General Data Protection Regulation”, the local country/ area’s personal information protection regulations, Apacer Privacy Statement (“Statement”) and other applicable laws .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The statement should specify the legal basis for processing (Article 6) and the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party (Article 6(1)(f)).
